scripts.build-watch: babel src -d dist --source-maps inline --copy-files --watch & babel examples -d dist --source-maps inline --copy-files --watch &
scripts.build-clean: rm -fr dist dist-es6 && mkdir -p dist dist-es6
scripts.build-es6: rm -fr dist-es6 && babel src --out-dir dist-es6 --plugins=static-fs --source-maps inline
scripts.build-es5: rm -fr dist && babel src --out-dir dist --plugins=static-fs,transform-es2015-modules-commonjs --source-maps inline
scripts.build-buble: rm -fr dist-buble && mkdir -p dist-buble && buble src -o dist-buble --no modules --y dangerousForOf --objectAssign
scripts.build: npm run build-es6 && npm run build-es5
scripts.build-shaders2: find . -name '*.glsl' -type f -exec bash -c 'echo "export default `\" ; cat "$1" ; echo "`;" "${1/glsl/glsl.js}"' -- {} \;
scripts.publish-prod: npm run build && npm run test-fast && npm publish
scripts.publish-beta: npm run build && npm run test-fast && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-node
scripts.test-fast: npm run lint && node test/node.js | faucet
scripts.test-shader: npm run build-dist && budo src/test/fp64-shader.spec.js:build/test-bundle.js --dir test --live --open --port 3001 --watch-glob '**/*.{html,css,scss,js,glsl}' -- -t babelify -t brfs-babel
scripts.docs-gh-pages-force: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix _docs dev`:gh-pages --force
scripts.docs-publish: npm run docs-build && git add _docs -f && git commit -m 'UPDATE DOCS' --no-verify && npm run docs-gh-pages
